round_best: Develop a hybrid neural architecture that combines graph convolutional networks (GCNs) with Riemannian geometry-based layers specifically designed for SPD matrices. This architecture would employ a dynamic sparsity-promoting regularization technique which adapts the level of sparsity during training based on the learning progress and geometric properties of the SPD manifold. The use of GCNs helps in leveraging local structural information within the data, while the specialized Riemannian layers ensure the output remains within the SPD cone, optimizing both expressivity and adherence to structural constraints.
